com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di

Class XmlBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.XmlBean
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XmlAspect

    public class XmlBean
extends java.lang.Object

    Encapsulates the notion of a "bean", which consists of a name or ID, a class, and optional properties, as defined in XML.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 06/26/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

      static class  XmlBean.Property
      Encapsulates a bean property, which represents a Field inside a bean instance.
